parameters.description: the language

parameters.description: not in use for now

parameters.description: contains a description what fields the result must return. If omitted an error is returned that describes the full set of fileds

parameters.description: contains a description of fields the result must be sorted by. If omitted no sort is applied

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: the currency in which the prices must be calculated.If omitted the POS currency will be used

parameters.name: pageNo

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: defines how many items a in one page. If omitted, 5 items per page are returned

parameters.description: the linkkey

parameters.name: lang
parameters.description: the language

parameters.name: searchId
parameters.description: the id of the search object

parameters.name: filterId
parameters.description: the id of the filter object

parameters.name: fields
parameters.description: contains a description what fields the result must return. If omitted an error is returned that describes the full set of fileds

parameters.name: sortingFields
parameters.description: contains a description of fields the result must be sorted by. If omitted no sort is applied

parameters.name: currency
parameters.description: the currency in which the prices must be calculated.If omitted the POS currency will be used

parameters.name: pageNo
parameters.description: the number of the page that need to be If omitted page 1 is returned

parameters.name: pageSize
parameters.description: defines how many items a in one page. If omitted, 5 items per page are returned
